lines.text: [Colonel Pot Shot's gun will not fire]
Uh, what's the matter with the gun?
There's your trouble, mister - hair trigger's full of dandruff.
[He blows on the trigger, then fires a few shots into the air]
Seems okay now. You try it.
[He throws the gun off the cliff. The Colonel runs to catch it, and goes over the edge as well]
[preparing to give Chilly a ride home]
Fasten your seatbelt, and no smokin'!
